title: What are some limitations of government officials shown in Plato's Allegory of the cave? - Quora

response.answer_text: Government officials are no different from the rest of us. They must respond to uncertainties. Occasionally, they have acted as if they were immune to the uncertainties, spouting ideological nostrums to justify their exercise of power. However, in order to continue to exercise power, officials must attempt to reduce uncertainties faced by and/or expand the opportunities available to their citizens.
